page.title: 01General overview of D-Block.
page.content: Our area is in Eastern Derbyshire right on the boundary with Nottinghamshire.It used to be part of the Nottinghamshire coalfield,but is now mainly light industry.In Somercotes and Riddings there are some factories that make such things as clothes and chemicals.There is a big brickworks at Butterley. About half of our area is built up and half is farmland.There are 4 villages that all run into each other-Somercotes,Leabrooks,Riddings, Swanwick but Ironville is on its own. The houses are mainly terraced,semi- detached and town-houses.The people are fairly ordinary and not that rich except for one area in Swanwick which is quite well off.
